DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation in the eyes of subjects with one prior trabeculectomy on one to three ocular hypotensive medications of the intraocular pressure (IOP) lowering effect of two iStent stents in combination with one iStent supra stent and a postoperative prostaglandin.
DOC.brief_title: Open-Angle Glaucoma Subjects With One Prior Trabeculectomy Treated Concurrently With One Suprachoroidal Stent and Two Trabecular Micro-bypass Stents
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation in the eyes of subjects with one prior trabeculectomy on one to three ocular hypotensive medications of the intraocular pressure (IOP) lowering effect of two iStent stents in combination with one iStent supra stent and a postoperative prostaglandin.
DOC.criteria: Phakic patients or pseudophakic patients with posterior chamber intraocular lenses (PCIOLs) Openangle glaucoma (including pseudoexfoliative) Aphakic patients or pseudophakic patients with anterior chamber IOLs (ACIOLs) Prior ALT Prior SLT within 90 days of screening visit
